import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { ArrowLeft, Users, Target, TrendingUp, Smartphone } from 'lucide-react'; const FinTechMobileApp: React.FC = () => { const [showBackButton, setShowBackButton] = React.useState(false); React.useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { setShowBackButton(window.scrollY > 100); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (
{/* Back Button */}
window.history.back()} className="flex items-center text-text-secondary hover:text-primary-color transition-colors duration-200" > Back
{/* Hero Section */}

FinTech Mobile App

Redesigned the mobile banking experience for a leading fintech company, improving user engagement by 40% and reducing support tickets by 60%.

Figma Prototyping User Research iOS/Android
{/* Project Image */}
{/* Project Details */}
{/* Left Column */}

Project Overview

This project involved redesigning the mobile banking experience for a leading fintech company that was struggling with low user engagement and high support ticket volumes. The existing app had a complex navigation structure and outdated design patterns that were causing user frustration.

The goal was to create a more intuitive, modern banking experience that would increase user engagement while reducing the need for customer support. We focused on simplifying complex financial processes and creating a more personalized user experience.

The redesign resulted in a 40% increase in user engagement and a 60% reduction in support tickets, demonstrating the power of user-centered design in the fintech space.

{/* Right Column */}

Key Achievements

40% Increase in User Engagement

Daily active users and session duration improved significantly after the redesign.

60% Reduction in Support Tickets

Simplified user flows and improved UX reduced customer confusion and support needs.

Improved Conversion Rates

Streamlined onboarding and transaction flows led to higher completion rates.
{/* Process Section */}

Design Process

1

Research & Analysis

Conducted user interviews, analyzed support ticket data, and performed competitive analysis to understand pain points and opportunities.

2

Design & Prototyping

Created wireframes, high-fidelity mockups, and interactive prototypes to test different design solutions and user flows.

3

Testing & Iteration

Conducted usability testing with real users, gathered feedback, and iterated on the design based on insights and metrics.

{/* Challenges & Solutions */}

Challenges & Solutions

Complex Navigation Structure

The existing app had a deep navigation hierarchy that made it difficult for users to find what they needed.

Solution: Implemented a simplified bottom navigation with the most frequently used features easily accessible. Used progressive disclosure to hide advanced features until needed.

Security vs. Usability Balance

Financial apps require strong security measures, but these often create friction in the user experience.

Solution: Designed contextual security prompts that only appear when necessary, and implemented biometric authentication for seamless access to frequently used features.

Cross-Platform Consistency

Maintaining design consistency across iOS and Android while respecting platform-specific patterns.

Solution: Created a unified design system with platform-specific adaptations for navigation patterns, gestures, and visual elements.

); }; export default FinTechMobileApp;
